param.name: pdf2.ug.chapter.header
param.desc: Select the layout of the top level DITA map components like: chapter, appendix, notices. The possible values are:\n * title-and-chapter-number - Title aligned in the left part and chapter number in the right\n * dita-ot-default - The default DITA-OT rendering

param.name: pdf2.ug.chapter.minitoc.layout
param.descr:
Select the layout of the chapter's minitoc.

The possible values are:
 * block - The blocks with chapter links and chapter descriptions will be layout in two separate blocks, one after other.
 * dita-ot-default - The default DITA-OT rendering with a table layout with one row with two cells. The first cell presents links to the chapter's topics and the second cell presents a short description of the chapter.
